pullRequest.title: Simplify RequestLineFrom
pullRequest.bodyText: Methods should  not throw any checked exceptions

nodes.bodyText: @Sammers21 Use cactoos decorators to trim and split the Text. And, if you want, you can get rid of this method and create constants for each piece of the information (METHOD = 0, URI = 1 and VERSION = 2) and you won't need to use this method
